title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Competencies: Instructor Competency Development for Enhancing E-Learning-Based Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Understanding of Educational Technology and Online Learning Platforms
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Design three or more instructional strategies for structuring course content to enhance learning satisfaction in e-learning environments
Apply two or more interactive techniques to promote learner engagement in online synchronous classes

Learners design three learning activities (e.g., role-play, simulation, portfolio) suitable for project-based assessments within a week and develop a 5-criteria evaluation rubric (clarity, practicality, creativity, collaboration, completeness) for each activity.
Utilize an instructional design framework for systematically structuring science-specific content
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
